document.full_text: the pirates have employed banister ever since they drafted him in 1986, through their near-glory years of the early 1990s through their record streak of 18 losing seasons.
document.title: extra bases: jeff banister: a pirate once, and a pirate still
lines_and_colors: the pirates have employed banister ever since they drafted him in 1986, through their near-glory years of the early 1990s through their record streak of 18 losing seasons.
